author: The Tasty Jaffa
install_msg: TempVoice - Creates Tempary voice channels for people in public discord servers - More info: [p]setvoice - Usage: [p]voice [name of channel]
short: Creates voice channels that will be deleted once empty
description: This cog - TempVoice will create Voice channels that will later be deleted after a set interval - Can have an optional argument of the name of the channel.
